appDesc.message: Add more tools and options for WhatsApp Web for more privacy and reliability.

restore_deleted_messages_help.message: Hover over a deleted message to restore it, WhatsApp Web should be open when the message is received.

enable_like_button_help.message: Get a thumbs up button like Facebook Messenger

enable_contact_status_help.message: Show contact status beside their name

keep_contact_info_open_help.message: Make the contact sidebar sticky in the chat window

enable_start_conversation_with_non_conta.message: Enable start conversation with non contacts
A new button to start conversations with people not on your contacts list

custom_background_image_help.message: Doesn't work if you have a background color enabled

night_mode_colors.message: Night Mode Colors <small>(Scroll down for more)</small>

disclaimer_text.message:
This feature is not intended to mass message people or spam them, it is intended to send congratulations, greetings and special invitation messages to family, friends and people you know, please use responsibly.

If you decide to misuse this feature, you might put your WhatsApp account at risk of permanently getting blocked.

to_start_using_open_wa_first.message: To start using the app, please open $1 first.

use_c_to_print_contact_name_as_saved_on_.message: Use {C} to print the contact name as saved on your phone.

use_u_to_print_contact_name_as_saved_on_.message: Use {U} to print the contact name as saved on their WhatsApp account.

random_separation_duration_between_messa.message: Random separation duration between messages (to avoid blocking)

paste_targets_text.message: Paste the target contacts with the following format: Name:Phone, every target should be in a new line. Omit any leading zeroes, brackets or dashes when adding the phone number in international format. You can also copy the 2 columns from Excel.

use_cf_to_print_contact_first_name_only_.message: Use {CF} to print the contact first name only as saved on your phone.

automated_messaging_description_3.message: Smart Replies: Assign keywords or predicted questions that are automatically answered.

automated_messaging_description_4.message: Subscribe now to unlock these features. The secure purchase is processed through Google Pay, you can cancel your subscription at any time from pay.google.com.

failed_to_connect_to_whatsapp_text.message: Oh! It seems that WA Web Plus could not communicate correctly this time with WhatsApp Web and some features might not function correctly. Click Reload to refresh the page and try again, or Cancel to use WhatsApp Web without WA Web Plus. If the problem presist, please inform the developers to fix it.

nart_3.message: We are celebrating the first tooth!

nart_4.message: Our new junior programmer got his first tooth up! We decided to credit our users with a discount of 10% on the Starter package, if you didn't try WA Web Plus yet, it's a good chance now!

import_targets_from_excel_sheet.message: Import targets from an Excel Sheet

import_targets_text.message: Select the XLSX or CSV file of your contacts, your sheet must contain the phone numbers in international format without any leading zeros, plus or dash signs. You can use additional columns such as name and extra parameter value that can be personalized in your message template, click here to learn how.

are_you_sure_you_want_to_reset_the_passw.message: Are you sure you want to reset the password? A new password will be sent to your WhatsApp account.

template_image_validation.message: Must be a valid image file (jpeg, jpg, png) and less than 1MB of size

template_file_validation.message: File size must be less than 60 MB

order_details_sent_to_email.message: Your license key and order details are sent to your email address when you subscribe. If you did not get an email from us please allow up to 10 minutes for your order to get processed. If you do not find the message in your inbox, please check the spam folder.

sticker_image_note.message:
Your sticker image should be square or it will look ugly. You can easily use www.remove.bg to automatically clear the background of your stickers and with one click!

Click the send button to receive the sticker in your WhatsApp personal chat.
